com.project.currency

Interface IExchanger


  • public interface IExchanger
    The IExchanger interface is responsible to declare the method to calculate the different coins rates.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double moneyExchange(double sourceCoin, double currencyAmount, double destinationCoin)
      Iterating the HashMap and returns ArrayList of Strings that will be shown at the GUI.

    • Method Detail

      • moneyExchange

        double moneyExchange(double sourceCoin,
                   double currencyAmount,
                   double destinationCoin)
        Iterating the HashMap and returns ArrayList of Strings that will be shown at the GUI. Each element in the ArrayList includes the coin name, country name and rate of currency.
        Parameters:
        sourceCoin - the rate of the source coin to be converted.
        currencyAmount - the amount to convert from source to destination coin.
        destinationCoin - the rate of the destination coin that was converted.
        Returns:
        the value of the destination coin after calculations.
